metadata.title: CVE-2017-17485 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - high
metadata.description: FasterXML jackson-databind through 2.8.10 and 2.9.x through 2.9.3 allowsunauthenticated remote code execution because of an incomplete fix for theCVE-2017-7525 deserialization flaw. This is exploitable by sendingmaliciously crafted JSON input to the readValue method of the ObjectMapper,bypassing a blacklist that is ineffective if the Spring libraries areavailable in the classpath.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
